detaileddescription.para: Check if 'swallowed' subwindow is known to the X server.
Gdk/GTK can mark the window as realized, mapped and visible even though there is no window-ID on the X server for it yet. Then, suil_x11_on_size_allocate() will cause a "BadWinow" X error.

memberdef.argsstring: (SuilHost *host, const char *host_type_uri, const char *ui_type_uri, LV2_Feature ***features, unsigned n_features)
memberdef.name: suil_wrapper_new

detaileddescription.para: Prototype for suil_wrapper_new in each module.
